name: hairvana-backend
description: Backend server for Hairvana salon management platform

scripts.sync:alter: node -e "const { sequelize } = require('./models'); sequelize.sync({ alter: true }).then(() => { console.log('Database synced with alterations!'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Error:', err); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.sync:force: node -e "const { sequelize } = require('./models'); sequelize.sync({ force: true }).then(() => { console.log('Database synced with force (all tables dropped and recreated)!'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Error:', err); process.exit(1); });"
scripts.sync:ordered: node -e "const { syncOrdered } = require('./models'); syncOrdered({ force: true }).then(() => { console.log('Database synced with ordered force!'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Error:', err); process.exit(1); });"
